SELECT DISTINCT order.id,createDate,`number`,productpic.picPath,product.descript,product.price,order.order_number,order.order_price,order_status.status FROM ageless.order INNER JOIN order_status ON ageless.order.OrderStatus=order_status.id INNER JOIN product ON ageless.order.productid=product.id INNER JOIN productpic ON ageless.order.productid=productpic.productId
WHERE order_status.status=#{status}
